channel.title: 317 Danger Pkz-Last Project by-D3i7y
channel.description:
This is my last project due to life getting harder but heres what ive done with help from many people Including -Rhys Best Coder I Have -D3i7y Hoster Me Some Touch ups -Rob for support -all the idea's and brain storms from somescape and old freescape great ideas with a new touch
Current Pic's
On Login [IMG]http://i421.photobucket.com/albums/pp291/D3i7y/Snap1-6.jpg[/img]
Max Level [IMG]http://i421.photobucket.com/albums/pp291/D3i7y/Snap5-4.jpg[/img]
Full Special [IMG]http://i421.photobucket.com/albums/pp291/D3i7y/Snap4-4.jpg[/img]
spec used [IMG]http://i421.photobucket.com/albums/pp291/D3i7y/Snap6-3.jpg[/img]
Added Fetures As OF This week
-Added syi blocker -3 connections per ip max -spec all working no gliches -dds double hit -whip spec -mass teleoirts fixed -teleports new -lagg handler added -connection handler -event manager added -anti flooder added -connection filter -event.java Much much more being added this weekend
Soon to be added -3 items oin death -skulls -a client -better shops -try to build an econemy -make a donater status -make a forum or website -make the site or forum .tk or co.cc -less npcs and better shops
more pictures comming soon the base is fr33scap3 pkz based in varrock
my msn is [email]d3i7y@hotmail.com[/email] if you have any ideas or sujestion
Server Name Danger Pkz(mopar)
this is based on old mopar server becuase moparscape is the best when its worked on

item.title: 317 Danger Pkz-Last Project by-D3i7y
item.dc:creator: @Exiled-Isle Exiled-Isle
item.description:
@Exiled-Isle wrote:

Ugh, i’d have to say why did you post like 3 pictures of you standing there, no offence. I think you should know what your talking about before you start blasting off words. An economy pretty much just happens depending on the source… Plus all this soon to be added ideas are pretty basic and are usually included with the source/client plus if your going to say Special Full then show the special…like this then show the special bar has decreased…

105za6d.jpg752×492
like that show the special, but overall i see you tried and i’m going to say Nice job.

PS. don’t take that as a flame just take it as constructive critism.

Read full topic
